name: MayFly (DanielThornton)
description: I built this game for the 2022 TPS fall game jam, it was made in 2 months. to play use WASD or the arrow keys. You can only land on platforms if you get lost follow the arrows they point in the general direction of the orbs. Due to some strange tech issues I can't test the build files so let me know if they don't run. it supports windows,linux and mac os. I will also be adding a web version later for those of you that have computers that it will not run on. (Heads up there is a known bug where after you lose a level the effects are still there I will fix this soon).
